comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110622063727

Steps to reproduce:

I was enlarging the text (ctrl + scroll) on this site: http://hackaday.com/2011/06/29/possessedhand-controls-hand-with-electrical-stimuli/


Actual results:

Makes the right pane with links disappear.....can be found somewhere at the bottom of the page.


Expected results:

I'm assuming that the right pane is supposed to get smaller as well and stay in place.
